thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 2 of 71
thread.title: Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I was trying to order online but couldn't figure out what refill I needed for my elderly Sensa pen, so I called. The woman who helped me told me how to find it on the website, then kindly offered to take my tiny order for three refills over the phone. She treated me as nicely as if I were spending lots of money! Nieman-Marcus in Dallas used to train clerks to treat the guy in overalls with mud on his boots as if he'd just flown in on his private plane--because he probably had. That's the way I felt. Ordering from a knowledgeable person beats the heck out of putzing around with a website.
